explanation: We observe that the circles at the corners are medium size, while the circles directly adjacent to the center are small size. Only the center circle is large size. Hence, the pattern is that the circles alternate in size depending on if they are at the corner or adjacent to the center.
deduction: Based on the pattern that the circles alternate in size depending on if they are at the corner or adjacent to the center, the size of the missing part that is at the corner should be medium.
